alert.note: Alert for Cooke; Montague (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 9:58PM CDT until June 17 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Montague County in north central Texas... Northern Cooke County in north central Texas... * Until 1100 PM CDT. * At 957 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located near Grady and Lake Nocona, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Callisburg, Lake Nocona, Hubert H Moss Lake, Nocona Hills, Walnut Bend, Bulcher, Sturgeon, Capps Corner, Illinois Bend, Marysville, Spanish Fort, Sivells Bend and Dexter. This includes Interstate 35 between mile markers 501 and 503. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
